list.name: Changes
list.comment: feat: integrate `flutter_dotenv` for environment variable management and update Firebase config to use `.env` file

task.summary: add initial screens and routing for campaign, chapter, adventure, and encounter features
add initial project structure and configuration files for moonforge
refactor workspace configuration and update task summaries for clarity
feat: integrate Firebase authentication and Firestore with Riverpod, add dynamic theming support
feat: add Firestore ODM models for campaign, chapter, adventure, scene, encounter, and media asset with JSON serialization support
feat: add generated models and builders for JoinCode, ChapterDoc, AdventureDoc, SceneDoc, EncounterDoc, and MediaAssetDoc with JSON serialization support
feat: simplify Campaign model by removing unused fields and updating JSON serialization
feat: add Firestore ODM models for JoinCode, Session, Party, Chapter, and MediaAsset with JSON serialization support
feat: add hotkey system, forgot password screen, and generated asset management files with logo icons
feat: update routing to use typed routes and add new dependencies for improved navigation
feat: add support for multiple app icons and logos with updated asset management
feat: add localization support with German and English translations, and implement theme and language settings in the UI
docs: expand README with detailed platform support, tech stack, setup steps, and contribution guidelines
feat: integrate `flutter_dotenv` for environment variable management and update Firebase config to use `.env` file
